meanings.definition: A person or animal that sprawls
meanings.sent1: The little puppy was one of the cutest sprawlers in the park.
meanings.sent2: The family of deer were peaceful sprawlers in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The toddler pretended to be a sleepy sprawler on the living room floor.
meanings.sent4: The vines in the garden were like lazy sprawlers reaching out in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The cat was a content sprawler, enjoying the warmth of the sun on the windowsill.

meanings.definition: A group of people or animals that sprawl
meanings.sent1: The tourists were noisy sprawlers taking up space on the crowded beach.
meanings.sent2: The herd of cows were relaxed sprawlers under the shade of the tree.
meanings.sent3: The children turned into giggling sprawlers during the game of tag.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with evening sprawlers enjoying the cool breeze.
meanings.sent5: The birds in the park were chirping sprawlers hopping from branch to branch.
